SIDEBAR_DESCRIPTION.DIALOGFLOW: Dialogflow is a natural language processing platform for building conversational interfaces. Integrating it with {installationName} lets bots handle queries first and transfer them to agents when needed. It helps qualify leads and reduce agent workload by answering FAQs. To add Dialogflow, create a Service Account in Google Console and share the credentials. Refer to the docs for details
